question:
Which of the following is equal to \(x^{\frac{3}{2}}\)?
(A) \(x^2 \sqrt{x}\)
(B) \(x \sqrt{x}\)
(C) \(\sqrt[3]{x^2}\)
(D) \(\sqrt[3]{x}\)
(E) \((x^3)^2\)
